answers.answer: Hi!If you were my patient, I would want to know right away that you are vomiting! I would do a pregnancy test, but I would also be quite concerned about your blood sugars.  The pill can affect your blood sugars.  If taken properly, the pill is a very reliable form of birth control,  It never hurts to use condoms too though.Good luck!Dr B

Thank you! It turned out i had a stomach bug. But i missed the pill last night and had sex unprotected and my period finished 3 days ago but today i had light bleeding. Im a bit worried and i never miss the pill and i thought i took it but just realised now..

question: I've been on levlen ed for about 2months and my boyfriend and I have had sex most days besides when i get my period. But we haven't been using condoms because we were relying on the pill. Last week i started taking penicillian (sorry if i spelt it wrong) and we have ha unprotected sex at least 4-5 times and each time he ha ejaculated. And my doctor never told me about penicillian effecting the pill. And only last night i started vomiting pretty badly. Im scared to tell my mum. My boyfriend also thinks i may be pregnant. What's the chance of being pregnant? And I also have juvenile diabetes. What could that effect? Im scared.
title: please help!!
